ComicInfo.Inker: Chance Wolf,Danny Miki,Todd McFarlane,Danny Miki,Chance Wolf,Todd McFarlane
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:19:44 [Issue ID 4000-99180] urn:comicvine:4000-99180 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:37:02. [Issue ID 219459]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Curse meets Tony Twist in the sewer and gives him the name of Keene. Meanwhile Vincent D'Egallo, A Knight of Templar, is confronted by Cog, who warns him of potential doom. After Twist kills Keene, he tells The Curse where D'Egallo is located and is attacked. In his quest to obtain spiritual armor, The Curse captures D'Egallo and cuts him open. Twist escapes and returns to the sewer the same time the Neece does, and a fierce battle ensues. Twist and Neece survive, but D'Egallo & The Curse die.
ComicInfo.Title: Curse the Curse
